## list() function

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function list<D extends StateType>(
  type: D,
  initialCount?: number
): ListStateType<D>
```

## Parameters

| Parameter    | Type   | Description                                                               |
| ------------ | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| type         | D      | The [state type](./internal__plugin-state.statetype.md) of the list items |
| initialCount | number | The initial number of list items                                          |
